chara.textHome: My name is Oriko Mikuni.
Do you know of me?

Amongst other Magical Girls, I am known
as the "White Magical Girl"...

I'm sure if you knew the truth,
you would agree with my cause as well.

Why don't we chat a while and
enjoy a cup of tea?

You have no hope of matching me
while you refuse to give in to despair.

Give up, Homura Akemi.
I am not like you...
always fleeing down different paths.
It matters not what sorrow lies ahead...
I will bear it all, and press onward!

When the road ahead is dark,
I shall light the way.
I will not run away from my fate.

I will use this strength for the
challenges I know lie ahead...

The reason I became a Magical Girl
in the first place was to learn the reason
why I exist, after all.
My father wanted to save the world...

He never managed it, but Kirika
and I will succeed where he failed.

May the path we tread be blessed...
Please watch over us as we go.
Good timing.
Kirika's just gone out.

If she was here, she'd get mad at me
for talking to you all the time.

It happened again...
I had another nightmare last night...
No, it wasn't a prophecy.

It was about a poor girl
who'd lost her reason to live.
*Giggle*
Almost time...

She's going to burst in saying 
how hungry she is.

She may be a bit childish, 
but she isn't a bad girl.
I made some tea...
it might be a bit too strong, though.
But no matter. No need to add any water...
We can add some milk.
It will rain...tomorrow evening.

If you're going out, you
should take your umbrella.
Well?
Don't you think my powers are pretty useful?
If it's my destiny...
No matter how dangerous it may be...
I will protect the future, whatever it takes.
All right, let's get going.

It has been decided.
The end is coming...
We must hurry.
Are you scared to fight?
You must be strong.
If there's something you want to protect,
you must not back down.
I did it! I did it!
What, you ask?

Well, it's my first time successfully 
baking a sponge cake...
It's so light and fluffy. *Giggle*
I must thank the cake gods!

Aah... 
I wasn't paying attention and burned myself.

I guess you can't think about
other things while you cook.
*Sigh*
I hope it heals quickly...
Where on Earth is Kirika...?
I guess I'm so used to being with her
I can't stand the silence anymore.

Kids should act like kids.
They shouldn't behave all the time.
No one like kids who try to act too mature.
Going on about Kyubey...
Treating him like a pet... It's wrong.

That creature is the source
of all our troubles.

I thought I managed to rid myself of all
my trivial emotions...

But if something happened to her...
I don't think I could bear it.
I need to be strong...
So I don't get crushed by my own sins...
Is surprising that I said that?

Kirika says that I'm the only person who's
important to her.
What about you?
Do you have someone like that, too?

It's too late...
I've come too far to turn back now...
But have I chosen the right path?
Sometimes I can't help but wonder...
I refuse to run away!
Checkmate.
Still have your will to resist?
Repent!
Would you like to be my pawn too?
I am Oriko Mikuni.

I will tell you the truth behind
Magical Girls...

I presume you have the mental fortitude
to handle it?
The path is laid out clearly before me...
All I can do is follow it.
I finally feel certainty with my own views.

Now let us proceed...
with this power in hand.
No one will be able to stop this.

That's why it has to be dealt
with before it is born.
So I have found you...protector.

Would you try to stop me, even as
I stand on the brink of the world's end?
You had best start accepting reality.
I will get rid of you, Homura Akemi.

One day, you will learn the hard way
how foolish it is to continue protecting
Madoka Kaname.
